about_the_game:
The Zone is a FPV Drone Simulator for FPV pilots who want to up their game and get some Sticktime in whenever it's not possible to go out for real.

It aims to capture all the most fun parts about FPV Freestyle flying, without the annoying and expensive stuff.

Fly all the best spots without having to worry about changing props or getting blasted out of the sky by an O3 air unit.

Spectate other Pilots and get inspiration, or challenge them to a game of KWAD!

Drone and Physics settings are kept to a minimum, and all the hard to get right settings are tweaked carefully by the developers using real world data and pro-pilot feedback.

Everything in the game is designed and programmed by sponsored freestyle pilot @nils vo.

A game controller or RC Plane Radio is required to play this game. For the best experience, use a RC Radio.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 6500 / AMD Ryzen 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Vega 8 / Intel Iris Plus G7
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Only playable with Game controller or RC Radio
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 6500 / AMD Ryzen 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD RX 580
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: RC Radio recommended

short_description: Learn new tricks, improve your freestyle flow, get inspiration by spectating other pilots, or learn to fly in the first place. The drone setup and physics are already dialed in by Pro pilots, so no need to mess with complicated settings.
